Easy Drum Creator (2-Bar).description: Quickly create simple 2-bar drum patterns. Great for looping and easy to use.

Flexible Drum Kit (4-Bar).description: Craft 4-bar drum rhythms with flexibility. Experiment with different drum sounds and rhythms.

Quick Melody Maker (4-Bar).description: Create a 4-bar melody. Ideal for sampling and getting started with making music.

Extended Melody Composer (16-Bar).description: Compose longer 16-bar melodies. Ideal for creating more extended musical phrases.

Trio Band Mix (4-Bar).description: Blend melody, bass, and drums in 4-bar segments. Like having a three-piece band at your fingertips.

Chord-Based Multi-Instrumentalist Mini (.description: Create multi-instrument tracks based on chords. Build a full track with harmonizing instruments.

Chord-Based Multi-Instrumentalist Medium.description: A larger 1-bar chord-conditioned multitrack model, trained with 64 free bits. Quantized to 1-byte weights.

Chord-Based Multi-Instrumentalist Large.description: A larger 1-bar chord-conditioned multitrack model, trained with 256 free bits. Quantized to 1-byte weights.

Groove Enhancer (1-Bar).description: Add groove to your 1-bar melodic patterns. Infuse your music with a special groove.

Groove Enhancer (2-Bar).description: Add groove to your 4-bar melodic patterns. Infuse your music with a special groove.

Groove Enhancer (3-Bar).description: Add groove to your 4-bar melodic patterns. Infuse your music with a special groove.

Groove Enhancer (4-Bar).description: Add groove to your 4-bar melodic patterns. Infuse your music with a special groove.

Melody Extender.description: Continue your melodies seamlessly. Like having a co-writer who never runs out of ideas.

Arpeggio Assistant.description: Generate arpeggiated sequences effortlessly. Add texture and movement to your music.

Chord Melody Mixer.description: Craft melodies over chord progressions. Perfect for songwriting and composition.

Generative Music.description: Create music through generative algorithmic compositions using Markov Chains.
